readable.title: 3118534315_cc03e5ddab
readable.content: A man is recording something with a red flag behind him . A man with a video camera is taping while another paints art while onlookers pass by . A person holding a camera in front of a pole with writing on it . Kid posts sign while a woman walks by and a young man hold a video camera The man is shooting video of another writing on a pole .
